headline.main: Letters to the Editor; Neglected Priorities: The Doctor Gap and Health Research

docs.abstract: Dr R I Schattner lr scores US med schools that do not utilize their facilities more fully to train more drs; says med schools should work 2 shifts as does indus; says drs in private practice could supplement existing faculties by teaching in evening; clinics would also be available at night; says only when current gap between supply and demand of drs is bridged, will we have healthier population; cartoon
docs.lead_paragraph: To the Editor: Some of the nation's "ills" can be related to our medical academic system. While we acknowledge the existence of a shortage of physicians, dentists and in the allied professions, not enough is being done to remedy the situation.
docs.snippet: To the Editor: Some of the nation's "ills" can be related to our medical academic system. While we acknowledge the existence of a shortage of physicians, dentists and in the allied professions, not enough is being done to remedy the situation.
